Set saving and loading interfaces for shiny bookmarking local storage

Source: R/utils.R
saveInterfaceLocal.Rd

The saveInterfaceLocal and loadInterfaceLocal functions provide implementations for saving and loading Shiny bookmark state to a local directory. These functions can be set as the saving and loading interfaces for Shiny bookmarking using shiny::shinyOptions().. While these callback functions are set by default when initializing a new instance of StorageClass, certain Shiny application structures such as applications created with the golem R package require these callbacks to be defined as part of the onStart argument in shiny::runApp().

Usage

saveInterfaceLocal(id, callback)

loadInterfaceLocal(id, callback)

Arguments

id

character string for session ID.

callback

function to call with the path to save/load the bookmark state.
